# sonatyperepo_capability_rut_auth (Resource)

Manage Capability: RUT Auth
		
**NOTE:** Requires Sonatype Nexus Repostiory 3.84.0 or later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_capability_rut_auth" "rut_auth_capability" {
  enabled = false
  notes   = "Reverse Unique Token authentication"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Capability is enabled.
- `properties` (Attributes) Properties specific to this Capability type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--properties))

### Optional

- `notes` (String) Optional notes about configured capability.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The internal ID of the Capability.
- `last_updated` (String) String representation of the date/time the resource was last changed

<a id="nestedatt--properties"></a>
### Nested Schema for `properties`

Required:

- `http_header` (String) Handled HTTP Header should contain the name of the header that is used to source the principal of already authenticated user.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import an existing RUT Auth Capability into Terraform State.
#
# NOTE: The CAPABILITY_ID can be obtained from the datasource.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_capability_rut_auth.cap_base_url CAPABILITY_ID
```
